mapper.select: SELECT sch_writenum, sch_id, sch_star, sch_title, sch_startdate, sch_starttime, sch_enddate, sch_endtime, sch_sticker FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SUBSTR(sch_startdate, 1, 8) ORDER BY sch_startdate ASC) RN, sch_writenum, sch_id, sch_star, sch_title, sch_startdate, sch_starttime, sch_enddate, sch_endtime, sch_sticker FROM SCHWRITE WHERE sch_id=#{sch_id} AND SUBSTR(sch_startdate, 1, 6)=#{sch_startdate} ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM SCHWRITE WHERE SCH_ID=#{sch_id} and SCH_WRITENUM=#{sch_writenum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHWRITE (sch_writenum, sch_id, sch_title, sch_star, sch_location, sch_startdate, sch_starttime, sch_enddate, sch_endtime, sch_rdate, sch_allday, sch_public, sch_sticker, sch_content, sch_docname, sch_alarm) VALUES(SEQ_SIST_SCHWRITE.NEXTVAL, #{sch_id}, #{sch_title}, #{sch_star}, #{sch_location}, #{sch_startdate}, #{sch_starttime}, #{sch_enddate}, #{sch_endtime}, SYSDATE, #{sch_allday}, #{sch_public}, #{sch_sticker}, #{sch_content}, #{sch_docname}, #{sch_alarm} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHWRITE SET SCH_TITLE=#{sch_title}, SCH_STAR=#{sch_star}, SCH_LOCATION=#{sch_location}, SCH_STARTDATE=#{sch_startdate}, SCH_STARTTIME=#{sch_starttime}, SCH_ENDDATE=#{sch_enddate}, SCH_ENDTIME=#{sch_endtime}, SCH_RDATE= SYSDATE, SCH_ALLDAY=#{sch_allday}, SCH_PUBLIC=#{sch_public}, SCH_STICKER=#{sch_sticker}, SCH_CONTENT=#{sch_content}, SCH_DOCNAME=#{sch_docname}, SCH_ALARM=#{sch_alarm}, SCH_FINISH=#{sch_finish} WHERE SCH_WRITENUM=#{sch_writenum}
